html: McCaskill has been fighting from day one to get her constituents affordable health care, and she has lots of proposals in Congress that the GOP won't even allow a vote on. What's Hawley's plan? Other than ax protections for people with pre-existing conditions, I mean?
text:
McCaskill has been fighting from day one to get her constituents affordable health care, and she has lots of proposals in Congress that the GOP won't even allow a vote on.

What's Hawley's plan? Other than ax protections for people with pre-existing conditions, I mean?
